<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ally's Shelter](/Feats.aspx?ID=1276) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw while adjacent to one or more allies, but you haven't rolled yet.

</column>

---

In stressful circumstances, you find strength in your allies' example. Roll the save using an adjacent ally's modifier for that type of saving throw instead of your own.
name: Ally's Shelter
